name: Doctor Who/Owl City crossover tumblr theme
description:
The dreamer wasn't dreaming anymore.

A crossover dashboard theme between Owl City (Adam Young) and Doctor Who. Created as a gift for the lovely Elysia ( http://bombshellginger.tumblr.com/ ) for Tumblr Hoot Owl Secret Santa 2012. Follow me at http://glacier-coast.tumblr.com for updates and more themes! :)
additional_info:
Works best in 1280x800 or 1680x1050 resolution. If you use a different resolution, you may have tiling issues within the dash's frame, but there shouldn't be any major problems. (I'm working on fixing all the little issues so just bear with me here, I wrote this in just a couple of days. :P)

To make a new post, hover over the black "Police Box" bar to find the buttons.

Feel free to send me an ask if you have any questions or suggestions.

7/17/14: Fixed post column and post colors, removed tumblr logo and search box color
11/1/14: New tumblr header capability (but some of the features have been thrown off due to the new tumblr layout)
